name: Fisty & Khuff
description:
In Fisty & Khuff, players take control of Khuff, the sole survivor of her civilization who wakes up at the bottom of an unfamiliar temple. Khuff is paired with her guardian: Fisty. The player needs to traverse the depths of the temple and climb to the very top. As the player climbs the temple, they encounter enemies and environmental puzzles that impede their progress.

Kobi Andt: Producer, Lead Designer, Sound Design

Bradley Richards: Level Designer, 2D Artist, UI Design

Daniel Swansson: Programmer

Elijah Potter: Lead Artist, Character and Technical Artist

Sophie Martin: Environment, Character and Technical Artist, Animator, Lighting

Amy Milburn: Character Artist, Rigger, Animator

Owen Anderson: Environment and Technical Artist
